sentence.Network_en: He attempts to rebut the assertion made by the prosecution witness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他试图反驳原告方证人所作的断言.

sentence.Network_en: He attempted to rebut the assertions made by the prosecution witness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他试图反驳控方证人所作的断言.

sentence.Network_en: This open letter is to rebut the argument of abstractionism.
sentence.Network_cn: 这封公开信是反驳抽象派论点的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一些翻译~（转的~） ... rebuff 断然拒绝 rebut 反驳 recriminate 回驳.
t3 flashcards | Quizlet ... sumptuous: 华丽的,奢侈的 rebut 反驳，驳回，击退 backlash 强烈抵制，集体反对.
英语同义词_徒工_新浪博客 ... deliberate 商议;思考 rebut 辩驳,驳斥 prove 证明,证实,显示.
2. 顽强反抗，不服从的rebut 反驳，证明为伪recall 忆起

list.abs: 反驳陈述 statement of objections反驳证据 rebutting evidence反证 disproving
Dennis rebutted them by saying he had put in checks and balances .丹尼斯反驳说他会检查和平衡的。
2006年8月9日 -  驳斥指责rebutted allegations 影响政府的国际声望hurts the government's international prestige 德国促请普京停止镇压车臣。车臣事件是普京声望急升的主因.
...宗南高佩瑶编撰12 行销管理学主讲人：沈宗南修正重购 （modified rebut） 指采购者希望改变产品规格、 价格、其他条件或供应 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the senses 'rebuke and repulse'): from Anglo-Norman French rebuter, from Old French re- (expressing opposition) + boter 'to butt'. Sense 1 (originally a legal use) dates from the early 19th cent

entry.def: If you rebut a charge or criticism that is made against you, you give reasons why it is untrue or unacceptable.

example.ex: He spent most of his speech rebutting criticisms of his foreign policy.
example.tran: 他讲演的大部分时间都在反驳对他外交政策的批评。

means.word_mean: 1. overthrow by argument, evidence, or proof;
2. prove to be false or incorrect

auth_sentence.content: He does not go out of his way to rebut religious arguments.
auth_sentence.res_content: He does not go out of his way to rebut religious arguments.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He does not go out of his way to rebut religious arguments.

auth_sentence.content: They sent party leaders to Denver to rebut points made by the Democrats.
auth_sentence.res_content: They sent party leaders to Denver to rebut points made by the Democrats.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They sent party leaders to Denver to rebut points made by the Democrats.

auth_sentence.content: He did not present me with anything that I could use to rebut the political right.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He did not present me with anything that I could use to rebut the political right.
